title: Support Page Down?
body: So I bought $5 of Rp to get Mecha aatrox that was half off, I got charged but never got the Rp or a receipt for the Rp ( I know it sometimes is supposed to take a while but they didn't give me anything in saying I paid), and I went to go to the support page, but that is down as well, what do I do?

replies.body: I looked into this for you and confirmed both the RP purchase and that you unlocked Mecha Aatrox.  Is this still an issue?  Regarding the support site, we're looking into this now.  It looks like the site is currently down and can't accept tickets or access articles.  Will gather more info as it comes!  Let me know if you have any questions.
I never got the receipt, it sent me the Rp though! Also the support page is down, which still is concerning!
